title: Bare Land for Sale in Battaramulla
details:
Highlights
- Land extent: 58.50 Perches
- Property is located on a lane off Lake Road, Thalangama, Battaramulla.
- Approx. 800m to Wickramasinghepura town.
- Approx. 1.5 km to Pannipitiya Main Road.

Access
- The property is accessible via a 15 foot wide access road, off Lake Road.
- Easy access from Pelawatte via D. P. Wijeshinghe Mawatha [Defence Head Quarters Rd] or Wickramasinghepura Road.

Details
- Bare land, fenced with gate.
- Water & electricity accessible.
- Clear title.

Asking Price: LKR 1.00 Million per perch. [Negotiable]
